Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.name: parallaxMotionEffect
Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.abstract: A property to allow customize parallax effect (pan, angles, etc.)

Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.name: shadowPanDeviation
Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.abstract: Maximum deviation of the shadow relative to the center

Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.name: subviewsParallaxMode
Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.abstract: Specify parallax effect of subiviews of the parallaxEffectView

Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.name: parallaxSubviewsContainer
Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.abstract: Custom container view that will be usead to apply subviews parallax effect

Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.name: glowContainerView
Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.abstract: A view that will be a container for the glow effect

Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.name: minVerticalPanGlowMultipler
Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.abstract: Minimum vertical value at the most top position can be adjusted by this multipler

Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.name: maxVerticalPanGlowMultipler
Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html#/s:12.abstract: Maximum vertical value at the most bottom position can be adjusted by this multipler

Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html.name: ParallaxEffectOptions
Structs/ParallaxEffectOptions.html.abstract: A type that allows to customize parallax effect

Protocols/ParallaxableView.html#/s:12Par.name: getGlowImageView()
Protocols/ParallaxableView.html#/s:12Par.abstract: Get the glow image view that can be used to create the glow effect

Protocols/ParallaxableView.html.name: ParallaxableView
Protocols/ParallaxableView.html.abstract: A type that can have parallax view representation

Protocols/AnyParallaxableView.html.name: AnyParallaxableView
Protocols/AnyParallaxableView.html.abstract: A type of a view that can have parallax effect

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC12Pa.name: addParallaxMotionEffects()
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC12Pa.abstract: Adds parallax motion effect to the view with default motion effect options

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC12Pa.name: addParallaxMotionEffects(with:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC12Pa.abstract: Adds parallax motion effect to the view with passed options

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC12Pa.name: removeParallaxMotionEffects(with:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC12Pa.abstract: Removes parallax motion effect from the view

Enums/SubviewsParallaxMode.html#/s:12Par.name: basedOnHierarchyInParallaxView(maxParallaxOffset:multipler:)
Enums/SubviewsParallaxMode.html#/s:12Par.abstract: Subview deeper on the hierarchy moves more depending on its index.

Enums/SubviewsParallaxMode.html#/s:12Par.name: basedOnTag
Enums/SubviewsParallaxMode.html#/s:12Par.abstract: Tag value will be used as maximum offset for parallax effect of the subview.

Enums/SubviewsParallaxMode.html#/s:12Par.name: none
Enums/SubviewsParallaxMode.html#/s:12Par.abstract: No parallax animation will be added to subviews of the parallax view

Enums/SubviewsParallaxMode.html.name: SubviewsParallaxMode
Enums/SubviewsParallaxMode.html.abstract: Modes of parallax motion effect that will be used for the subviews of the parallax view

Classes/ParallaxView.html#/s:12ParallaxV.name: setupParallax()
Classes/ParallaxView.html#/s:12ParallaxV.abstract: Override this method in your ParallaxView subclass if you would like to provide custom

Classes/ParallaxCollectionViewCell.html#.name: setupParallax()
Classes/ParallaxCollectionViewCell.html#.abstract: Override this method in your ParallaxCollectionViewCell subclass if you would like to provide custom

Classes/ParallaxMotionEffect.html#/s:12P.name: cameraPositionZ
Classes/ParallaxMotionEffect.html#/s:12P.abstract: How far camera is from the object

Classes/ParallaxMotionEffect.html#/s:12P.name: m34
Classes/ParallaxMotionEffect.html#/s:12P.abstract: Perspective value. The closer is to 0 the deepest is the perspective

Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.name: setupUnfocusedState
Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.abstract: Closure will be called in animation block by ParallaxableView when view should change its appearance to the focused state

Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.name: setupFocusedState
Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.abstract: Closure will be called in animation block by ParallaxableView when view should change its appearance to the unfocused state

Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.name: beforeBecomeFocusedAnimation
Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.abstract: Closure will be called by ParallaxableView before the animation to the focused state start

Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.name: beforeResignFocusAnimation
Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.abstract: Closure will be called by ParallaxableView before the animation to the unfocused state start

Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.name: becomeFocused
Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.abstract: Closure will be called when didFocusChange happened. In most cases default implementation should work

Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.name: resignFocus
Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.abstract: Closure will be called when didFocusChange happened. In most cases default implementation should work

Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.name: animatePressIn
Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.abstract: Default implementation of the press begin animation for the ParallaxableView

Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.name: animatePressOut
Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.abstract: Default implementation of the press ended animation for the ParallaxableView

Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.name: init()
Classes/ParallaxViewActions.html#/s:12Pa.abstract: Creates actions for parallax view with default behaviours

Classes/ParallaxMotionEffect.html.name: ParallaxMotionEffect
Classes/ParallaxMotionEffect.html.abstract: A UIMotionEffect subclass that makes parallax motion effect by applying custom transformation.

Classes/ParallaxCollectionViewCell.html.name: ParallaxCollectionViewCell
Classes/ParallaxCollectionViewCell.html.abstract: An object that provides default implementation of the parallax effect for the UICollectionViewCell.

Classes/ParallaxView.html.name: ParallaxView
Classes/ParallaxView.html.abstract: An object that provides default implementation of the parallax effect for the UIView.
